Name: Gedaria
About the game: About Gedaria is a 2D adventure puzzle-platformer , from a Czech independent game developer team of two high school students. The game takes place in the past. You will take on a role of a peasant Vladimir, on the way to the liberation of his kidnapped familyâ€¦ The game will surely captivate you with its simple but beautiful autumn atmosphere and non-traditional game mechanics. Main Character The main character Vladimir is the son of a farmer, an ordinary boy who finds a legendary rake , which gives him the ability to rake leaves into piles and solve puzzles across levels. Unique Mechanics Piles of leaves, leaf holders, wind, quick-leaves (quick sand made of leaves ðŸ˜‰), leaves, leaf blower.
